amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2123 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2123 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 26. Record Vote Number: 286.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2123 made in Senate.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 302(c) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2123.
Amendment SA 2123 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S5155-5156; text: CR S5182-5185) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2123 proposed by Senator Leahy.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2123 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 26. Record Vote Number: 286.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2123 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
